Goal

TThe paris agrement aims to promote the global climate change responce by increasing the ability of all to adapt to adavaease effects of climate chnge and foster climate resillience.The goal is;

  • To enhance adaptability and resillience
  • To reduce vulnerability in order to achieve sustainable development
  • To ensure adequate adaptive responce in combating global warning

planning and impementation

The agreement requires all parties to engage in adaptation planning and implementation through;

  • the national adaptation plan
  • vulnerability and needs assesment
  • monitoring and evaluation
  • economic diversification

Transparency

The agreement will improve the understanding of climate change and the transparency of actions by establishing a new framework that should provide information related to climate change impacts and adaptation
